title: Acts of Kindness
creator_credit: Michael Landy, Pinky Ghundale, Film London and Channel 4
brief_description: A celebration of everyday acts of kindness that happen on London Underground every day of the year. The film originated from ‘Acts of Kindness’, a project by Michael Landy for London Underground, commissioned by Art on the Underground, London Underground Limited, 2011-12.
creator_credit_for_label: Michael Landy, Pinky Ghundale, Film London and Channel 4
